refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a new true color image

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: imagecreatetruecolor returns an image identifier representing a black image of size x_size by y_size.

example.title: Creating a new GD image stream and outputting an image.
example.programlisting:
<?php
header ("Content-type: image/png");
$im = @imagecreatetruecolor(50, 100)
      or die("Cannot Initialize new GD image stream");
$text_color = imagecolorallocate($im, 233, 14, 91);
imagestring($im, 1, 5, 5,  "A Simple Text String", $text_color);
imagepng($im);
imagedestroy($im);
?>

note.para: This function was added in PHP 4.0.6 and requires GD 2.0.1 or later.
This function will not work with GIF file formats.
